docs.summary: FAQ API for viewing and managing site owner's Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) section

permissions.name: Manage FAQ
permissions.description: Request permissions to read, create and update FAQ question and answer data

params.name: questionIds
params.doc: List of question entry IDs to change status for.

params.name: status
params.doc: Updated status of question entries.

docs.summary: Updates multiple question entries' statuses.

extra.description: Updates the status of a question entry. Replaces previous status

permissions.name: Manage FAQ
permissions.description: Request permissions to read, create and update FAQ question and answer data

params.name: updates
params.doc: List of updates for questions within a label, each containing the ID of the question to update, and optional new values for label and its order.

docs.summary: Retrieves up to 100 question entries, given the provided filtering, paging, and sorting. Use the `fieldSet` parameter to set whether sharing links are included in the response.

docs.summary: Update an existing question entry. Replaces the previous version.

response:
{"question": {
  "id": "69015ce8-4f38-4324-88d0-9a55dd0838d0",
  "question": {"draftjs": "what is your updated question?"},
  "answer": {"draftjs": {"text": "This is the answer"}},
  "orderSequence": 20,
  "categoryId": "first",
  "status": "VISIBLE",
  "labels":   [
    "first",
    "second"
  ],
  "slug": "what-is-the-question",
  "share_link": null
}}

permissions.name: Manage FAQ
permissions.description: Request permissions to read, create and update FAQ question and answer data

params.name: visibility
params.doc: List of visibility updates for questions entries, each containing the ID of the question to update, and optional new values for status, order and categoryId.

docs.summary: Updates multiple question entries' visibility within their categories.

members.name: limit
members.doc:
The number of items to load.
 Cursor token returned in the query response. To be used on the next query request, but not the first query request.

members.name: cursor
members.doc: Cursor returned in last query response. Should not be provided on first page request

members.name: count
members.doc: Number of items returned in the response.

members.name: offset
members.doc: Offset that was requested.

members.name: total
members.doc: Total number of items that match the query. Returned if offset paging is used and the `tooManyToCount` flag is not set.

members.name: tooManyToCount
members.doc: Flag that indicates the server failed to calculate the `total` field.

members.name: cursors
members.doc: Cursors to navigate through the result pages using `next` and `prev`. Returned if cursor paging is used.

members.name: next
members.doc: Cursor pointing to next result page.

members.name: prev
members.doc: Cursor pointing to previous result page.

docs.summary: Category of question entries within a site.

members.name: id
members.doc: Category ID.

members.name: title
members.doc: Category title.

members.name: sortOrder
members.doc: Order of category within a site.

docs.summary: Question entry, including a single question and its answer.

members.name: id
members.doc: ID of this question entry.

members.name: question
members.doc: Question text.

members.name: answer
members.doc: Contains the answer to the question.

members.name: labels
members.doc: List of up to 100 labels for this question entry.

members.name: sortOrder
members.doc: Order of question entry within its category.

members.name: status
members.doc: Question entry's visibility status within the site.

members.name: categoryId
members.doc: ID of the category to which this question belongs.

members.name: slug
members.doc: URL slug for this question generated from the question entry's text.

members.name: shareLink
members.doc: Unique question URL.

members.name: draftjs
members.doc: draft.js rich text.

members.name: plainText
members.doc: Plain text.

members.name: title
members.doc: Label title.

members.name: sortOrder
members.doc: Order of question entry within label.

docs.summary: Container used to update a question entry's visibility, ordering, and category.

members.name: questionId
members.doc: ID of the question entry to update.

members.name: categoryId
members.doc: ID of new category.

members.name: sortOrder
members.doc: New order of question entry in category.

members.name: status
members.doc: New status of question entry.

docs.summary: Container to update question entry's order and status within a label.

members.name: label

members.name: questionIds
members.doc: List of question IDs.

members.name: questionLabel
members.doc: Question label.

members.name: paging
members.doc: Not needed if `question_id`s are provided in filter.

members.name: contentFormat
members.doc: Text output format.

members.name: questions
members.doc: List of question entries.

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • VISIBLE
  • HIDDEN

Possible values are:
  • DRAFTJS
  • PLAIN_TEXT

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • SHARE_LINKS - Include `share_link` fields inside question entries.
